contactForm.policyContents1: By agreeing to the Service in any manner, you acknowledge that you accept the practices and policies outlined in this Privacy Policy, and you hereby consent that SOOHO.IO will collect, use, and share the following information.
contactForm.policyContents2:
01 Name, email, phone number, company
02 The content of the inquiry
03 Personal information will be stored for 1 year after handling the inquiry
contactForm.fileGuideContents:
- The maximum file capacity is 2MB.
- You can upload up to one file
- File type: zip, jpg, png, pdf
